In England, in the seven days to 28 June, there were 107,705 new confirmed cases (190.5 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 21 June, there were 63,029 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 71% (44,676 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 03 July is 4,239,686 (7,497.2 cases per 100,000 population).
